Question: How can we change customer Name or Shop Name
Answers: 1. BMD/FR/BP/AM can send mail to Techsupport@pearlcomp.com along with Zonal Manager Approval.

Question: How can update GSTN
Answers: 1. GSTN can update during New Enrollment, Geo Verification or by BMD login if customer already Geo Verified or enrolled from Utility menu

Question: How can update Shop Registration Copy
Answers: 1. GSRegistration can update during New Enrollment, Geo Verification or by BMD login if customer already Geo Verified or enrolled from Utility menu

Question: If GSTN already updated then still Shop Registration Copy required
Answers: 1. No, if GSTN already updated then Shop Registration Copy not required

Question: How can waive offed customer for GSTN
Answers: 1. Only NW can avail the benefit for GSTN Waive off logic. Also benefit is application only for Incentive calculation not for Payout

Question: How can change the Mobile No. of customer
Answers: 1. BMD/FR/BP/AM can send mail to Techsupport@pearlcomp.com along with Channel Manager Approval
